article_title: As Value-Based Care Spreads, Tenet Healthcare Spends $2B On Outpatient Surgery

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Tenet Healthcare Corp. (THC) said it will form a joint venture with United Surgical Partners International to create the largest provider of ambulatory surgery in the U.S. The deal announced this morning comes as government and private insurance companies demand lower cost and high quality care under the same coordinated umbrella, [...]
